dict.string: "SweetSpots uses your location to show nearby spots on the map, sort them by distance, and send you proximity alerts when you're near a saved spot (even when the app is in the background). For example, you can get a notification when you are driving near a 'SweetSpot' you saved."

"SweetSpots uses your location to show nearby spots on the map, sort them by distance, and send you proximity alerts when you're near a saved spot (even when the app is in the background). For example, you can get a notification when you are driving near a 'SweetSpot' you saved."
"Notifications are used to alert you when you are near one of your saved SweetSpots."
